resources.string: Working with ABAP / PI developer since 2011, I start my work with sap 4.6c. Education: Tecnology in Softwares development at University Salgado de Oliveira , 4 year. I Have knowledge in: Fiori Apps, Hana, CDS, ALV, REPORT, BATCH INPUT, MODULE POOL, FUNCTION, HR, SAP SCRIPT, QUERY, RFC, lSMW, BAPI, BADI, IDOC, ALVOO,OO DEVELOPMENT, INTERFACES. I work with Modules: FI/CO, SD, MM, QM, PP, HR, WM, LO, AI, and FI.

I have a degree in systems analysis and mathematics, I am currently doing a master\'s degree in systems development at MIU. I love studying, and always looking for the best for my life and for my family.

I am a very motivated person who lives for technology and my family. One of the most important things about me is that I am a person with a great ability to work under pressure and in difficult situations. I love computer programming and also things related to economics and the stock market.
Bachelor in systems analysis and development, from Salgado Oliveira University, in Brazil
Master in Systems Development, expected to graduate in 2023
